holidays.name: International Ninja Day 🥷
holidays.description: A day to celebrate the mysterious and stealthy warriors of feudal Japan — the ninjas! Fans worldwide honor their skills, costumes, and secretive ways with parties, cosplay, and ninja-themed activities.
holidays.origin: International Ninja Day traces its roots back to the fascination with ninja culture popularized by movies and martial arts schools; it gained traction online in the early 2000s.
holidays.funFact: The date December 5 was chosen because it honors the death anniversary of Hatsuse Magosaburo, a famous ninja master.

holidays.name: National Repeal Day 🍸
holidays.description: This day marks the anniversary of the repeal of Prohibition in the United States, where people celebrate freedom to enjoy alcoholic beverages and raise a toast to legal cocktails!
holidays.origin: December 5, 1933, the 21st Amendment was ratified, officially ending Prohibition that had banned alcohol since 1920.
holidays.funFact: After Prohibition ended, alcohol sales skyrocketed, and speakeasy culture transformed into legal bars almost overnight.

holidays.name: Bathtub Party Day 🛁
holidays.description: A quirky celebration encouraging people to throw themselves a bubbly party in the bathtub — think candles, rubber ducks, and relaxing tunes! It's all about unwinding and self-care.
holidays.origin: Originating from online communities promoting self-care rituals, Bathtub Party Day gained popularity as a whimsical way to de-stress during busy December schedules.
holidays.funFact: The world's longest bathtub party was held with over 200 people celebrating simultaneously!

holidays.name: International Volunteer Day for Economic and Social Development 🌍
holidays.description: A day recognizing the role volunteers play in fostering social and economic development around the globe, inspiring acts of kindness and community support.
holidays.origin: Established by the United Nations in 1985 to promote volunteerism worldwide.
holidays.funFact: Each year, International Volunteer Day highlights different themes, with past focuses including education, environment, and youth engagement.
